snippet: The New York-based company said earnings decreased to $439 million, or 76 cents a share, from $472 million, or 76 cents a share, in the same quarter a year ago.
abstract: CBS reports second-quarter earnings of $439 million, down 7 percent from $472 million in year ago quarter; revenue fell 5 percent, to $3.19 billion from $3.37 billion.
lead_paragraph: The New York-based company said earnings decreased to $439 million, or 76 cents a share, from $472 million, or 76 cents a share, in the same quarter a year ago.

headline.main: CBS Reports Lower Earnings but Beats Analysts’ Expectations
headline.print_headline: CBS Reports Lower Earnings but Beats Analysts’ Expectations
